publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3601 Fiona Hyslop: Tam the Gun—That the Parliament notes the death of Staff Sergeant Thomas McKay, known as Tam the Gun, who fired the One o’Clock Gun from the ramparts of Edinburgh Castle for more than 25 years; acknowledges his contribution to the Scottish tourist industry and the Army Benevolent Fund, and extends its condolences to his family.Supported by: Margaret Smith*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-3601 Tam the Gun (lodged on 18 November 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Robin Harper*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-3601 Tam the Gun (lodged on 18 November 2005) Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*
